destined to she -> needed : 1
to she needed -> more : 1
she needed more -> by : 1
needed more by -> at : 1
more by at -> at : 1
by at at -> the : 1
at at the -> hunter : 1
at the hunter -> lives : 1
the hunter lives -> in : 1
hunter lives in -> where : 1
lives in where -> at : 1
in where at -> work : 1
where at work -> on : 1
at work on -> her : 1
work on her -> next : 1
on her next -> shadow : 1
her next shadow -> falls : 1
next shadow falls -> to : 1
shadow falls to -> learn : 1
falls to learn -> visit : 1
to learn visit -> her : 1
learn visit her -> on : 1
visit her on -> the : 1
the web at -> is : 1
web at is -> a : 1
at is a -> work : 1
is a work -> of : 1
a work of -> all : 1
work of all -> of : 1
of all of -> the : 1
the and events -> portrayed : 1
and events portrayed -> in : 1
events portrayed in -> this : 1
portrayed in this -> novel : 1
in this novel -> are : 1
this novel are -> either : 1
novel are either -> products : 1
are either products -> of : 1
either products of -> the : 1
products of the -> imagination : 1
of the imagination -> or : 1
the imagination or -> are : 1
imagination or are -> used : 1
or are used -> at : 1
are used at -> copyright : 1
used at copyright -> by : 1
at copyright by -> christie : 1
copyright by christie -> all : 1
by christie all -> rights : 1
christie all rights -> for : 1
all rights for -> address : 1
rights for address -> fifth : 1
for address fifth -> new : 1
address fifth new -> library : 1
fifth new library -> of : 1
new library of -> congress : 1
library of congress -> has : 1
of congress has -> cataloged : 1
congress has cataloged -> the : 1
has cataloged the -> print : 1
cataloged the print -> edition : 1
the print edition -> as : 1
print edition as -> at : 1
edition as at -> dusk : 1
as at dusk -> juvenile : 1
at dusk juvenile -> fiction : 1
dusk juvenile fiction -> fantasy : 1
juvenile fiction fantasy -> and : 1
fiction fantasy and -> april : 1
